00044 // quicktime structure definition
00045 // this structure is part of the anim struct
00046 
00047 typedef struct _QuicktimeMovie {
00048     QTMovie *movie;
00049     QTMedia *media;
00050     
00051     long durationTime;
00052     long durationScale;
00053     long framecount;
00054     
00055 
00056     ImBuf *ibuf;
00057     
00058     long previousPosition;
00059     
00060 } QuicktimeMovie;

00066 void quicktime_init(void)
00067 {
00068         G.have_quicktime = TRUE;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 void quicktime_exit(void)
00073 {
00074     if(G.have_quicktime) {
00075         free_qtcomponentdata();
00076     }
00077 }

00080 int anim_is_quicktime (const char *name)
00081 {
00082     NSAutoreleasePool *pool;
00083     
00084     // don't let quicktime movie import handle these
00085     if( BLI_testextensie(name, ".swf") ||
00086         BLI_testextensie(name, ".txt") ||
00087         BLI_testextensie(name, ".mpg") ||
00088         BLI_testextensie(name, ".avi") ||   // wouldnt be appropriate ;)
00089         BLI_testextensie(name, ".mov") ||   // disabled, suboptimal decoding speed   
00090         BLI_testextensie(name, ".mp4") ||   // disabled, suboptimal decoding speed
00091         BLI_testextensie(name, ".m4v") ||   // disabled, suboptimal decoding speed
00092         BLI_testextensie(name, ".tga") ||
00093         BLI_testextensie(name, ".png") ||
00094         BLI_testextensie(name, ".bmp") ||
00095         BLI_testextensie(name, ".jpg") ||
00096         BLI_testextensie(name, ".wav") ||
00097         BLI_testextensie(name, ".zip") ||
00098         BLI_testextensie(name, ".mp3")) return 0;
00099 
00100     if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("qt: checking as movie: %s\n", name);
00101 
00102     pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00103     
00104     if([QTMovie canInitWithFile:[NSString stringWithCString:name 
00105                                  encoding:[NSString defaultCStringEncoding]]])
00106     {
00107         [pool drain];
00108         return true;
00109     }
00110     else
00111     {
00112         [pool drain];
00113         return false;
00114     }
00115 }

00118 void free_anim_quicktime (struct anim *anim)
00119 {
00120     NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00121     
00122     if (anim == NULL) return;
00123     if (anim->qtime == NULL) return;
00124 
00125     if(anim->qtime->ibuf)
00126         IMB_freeImBuf(anim->qtime->ibuf);
00127 
00128     [anim->qtime->media release];
00129     [anim->qtime->movie release];
00130 
00131     [QTMovie exitQTKitOnThread];
00132 
00133     if(anim->qtime) MEM_freeN (anim->qtime);
00134 
00135     anim->qtime = NULL;
00136 
00137     anim->duration = 0;
00138 
00139     [pool drain];
00140 }

00142 static ImBuf * nsImageToiBuf(NSImage *sourceImage, int width, int height)
00143 {
00144     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
00145     uchar *rasterRGB = NULL;
00146     uchar *rasterRGBA = NULL;
00147     uchar *toIBuf = NULL;
00148     int x, y, to_i, from_i;
00149     NSSize bitmapSize;
00150     NSBitmapImageRep *blBitmapFormatImageRGB,*blBitmapFormatImageRGBA,*bitmapImage=nil;
00151     NSEnumerator *enumerator;
00152     NSImageRep *representation;
00153     
00154     ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (width, height, 32, IB_rect);
00155     if (!ibuf) {
00156         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("quicktime_import: could not allocate memory for the " \
00157                 "image.\n");
00158         return NULL;
00159     }
00160     
00161     /*Get the bitmap of the image*/
00162     enumerator = [[sourceImage representations] objectEnumerator];
00163     while ((representation = [enumerator nextObject])) {
00164         if ([representation isKindOfClass:[NSBitmapImageRep class]]) {
00165             bitmapImage = (NSBitmapImageRep *)representation;
00166             break;
00167         }
00168     }
00169     if (bitmapImage == nil) return NULL;
00170 
00171     if (([bitmapImage bitsPerPixel] == 32) && (([bitmapImage bitmapFormat] & 0x5) == 0)
00172         && ![bitmapImage isPlanar]) {
00173         /* Try a fast copy if the image is a meshed RGBA 32bit bitmap*/
00174         toIBuf = (uchar*)ibuf->rect;
00175         rasterRGB = (uchar*)[bitmapImage bitmapData];
00176         for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00177             to_i = (height-y-1)*width;
00178             from_i = y*width;
00179             memcpy(toIBuf+4*to_i, rasterRGB+4*from_i, 4*width);
00180         }
00181     }
00182     else {
00183 
00184         bitmapSize.width = width;
00185         bitmapSize.height = height;
00186         
00187         /* Tell cocoa image resolution is same as current system one */
00188         [bitmapImage setSize:bitmapSize];
00189         
00190         /* Convert the image in a RGBA 32bit format */
00191         /* As Core Graphics does not support contextes with non premutliplied alpha,
00192          we need to get alpha key values in a separate batch */
00193         
00194         /* First get RGB values w/o Alpha to avoid pre-multiplication, 32bit but last byte is unused */
00195         blBitmapFormatImageRGB = /*RGB format padded to 32bits*/[[NSBitmapImageRep alloc] initWithBitmapDataPlanes:NULL
00196                                                                          pixelsWide:width 
00197                                                                          pixelsHigh:height
00198                                                                       bitsPerSample:8 samplesPerPixel:3 hasAlpha:NO isPlanar:NO
00199                                                                      colorSpaceName:NSDeviceRGBColorSpace 
00200                                                                        bitmapFormat:0
00201                                                                         bytesPerRow:4*width
00202                                                                        bitsPerPixel:32];
00203         
00204         [NSGraphicsContext saveGraphicsState];
00205         [NSGraphicsContext setCurrentContext:[NSGraphicsContext graphicsContextWithBitmapImageRep:blBitmapFormatImageRGB]];
00206         [bitmapImage draw];
00207         [NSGraphicsContext restoreGraphicsState];
00208         
00209         rasterRGB = (uchar*)[blBitmapFormatImageRGB bitmapData];
00210         if (rasterRGB == NULL) {
00211             [blBitmapFormatImageRGB release];
00212             return NULL;
00213         }
00214         
00215         /* Then get Alpha values by getting the RGBA image (that is premultiplied btw) */
00216         blBitmapFormatImageRGBA = /* RGBA */[[NSBitmapImageRep alloc] initWithBitmapDataPlanes:NULL
00217                                                                           pixelsWide:width
00218                                                                           pixelsHigh:height
00219                                                                        bitsPerSample:8 samplesPerPixel:4 hasAlpha:YES isPlanar:NO
00220                                                                       colorSpaceName:NSDeviceRGBColorSpace
00221                                                                         bitmapFormat:0
00222                                                                          bytesPerRow:4*width
00223                                                                         bitsPerPixel:32];
00224         
00225         [NSGraphicsContext saveGraphicsState];
00226         [NSGraphicsContext setCurrentContext:[NSGraphicsContext graphicsContextWithBitmapImageRep:blBitmapFormatImageRGBA]];
00227         [bitmapImage draw];
00228         [NSGraphicsContext restoreGraphicsState];
00229         
00230         rasterRGBA = (uchar*)[blBitmapFormatImageRGBA bitmapData];
00231         if (rasterRGBA == NULL) {
00232             [blBitmapFormatImageRGB release];
00233             [blBitmapFormatImageRGBA release];
00234             return NULL;
00235         }
00236 
00237         /*Copy the image to ibuf, flipping it vertically*/
00238         toIBuf = (uchar*)ibuf->rect;
00239         for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00240             for (x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00241                 to_i = (height-y-1)*width + x;
00242                 from_i = y*width + x;
00243                 
00244                 toIBuf[4*to_i] = rasterRGB[4*from_i]; /* R */
00245                 toIBuf[4*to_i+1] = rasterRGB[4*from_i+1]; /* G */
00246                 toIBuf[4*to_i+2] = rasterRGB[4*from_i+2]; /* B */
00247                 toIBuf[4*to_i+3] = rasterRGBA[4*from_i+3]; /* A */
00248             }
00249         }
00250 
00251         [blBitmapFormatImageRGB release];
00252         [blBitmapFormatImageRGBA release];
00253     }
00254     
00255     return ibuf;
00256 }
00257 
00258 ImBuf * qtime_fetchibuf (struct anim *anim, int position)
00259 {
00260     NSImage *frameImage;
00261     QTTime time;
00262     NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00263     ImBuf *ibuf;
00264     
00265     if (anim == NULL) {
00266         return (NULL);
00267     }
00268 
00269     if (position == anim->qtime->previousPosition+1) { //Optimize sequential read
00270         [anim->qtime->movie stepForward];
00271         frameImage = [anim->qtime->movie currentFrameImage];
00272         anim->qtime->previousPosition++;
00273     }
00274     else {
00275         time.timeScale = anim->qtime->durationScale;
00276         time.timeValue = (anim->qtime->durationTime * position) / anim->qtime->framecount;
00277     
00278         [anim->qtime->movie setCurrentTime:time];
00279         frameImage = [anim->qtime->movie currentFrameImage]; 
00280         
00281         anim->qtime->previousPosition = position;
00282     }
00283         
00284     if (frameImage == nil) {
00285         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf ("Error reading frame from Quicktime");
00286         [pool drain];
00287         return NULL;
00288     }
00289 
00290     ibuf = nsImageToiBuf(frameImage,anim->x, anim->y);
00291     [pool drain];
00292     
00293     ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00294     return ibuf;
00295 }

00297 
00298 int startquicktime (struct anim *anim)
00299 {
00300     NSAutoreleasePool *pool;
00301     NSArray* videoTracks;
00302     NSSize frameSize;
00303     QTTime qtTimeDuration;
00304     NSDictionary *attributes;
00305     
00306     anim->qtime = MEM_callocN (sizeof(QuicktimeMovie),"animqt");
00307 
00308     if (anim->qtime == NULL) {
00309         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("Can't alloc qtime: %s\n", anim->name);
00310         return -1;
00311     }
00312 
00313     pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00314     
00315     [QTMovie enterQTKitOnThread];       
00316 
00317     attributes = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00318             [NSString stringWithCString:anim->name
00319             encoding:[NSString defaultCStringEncoding]], QTMovieFileNameAttribute,
00320             [NSNumber numberWithBool:NO], QTMovieEditableAttribute,
00321         nil];
00322 
00323     anim->qtime->movie = [QTMovie movieWithAttributes:attributes error:NULL];
00324     
00325     if (!anim->qtime->movie) {
00326         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("qt: bad movie %s\n", anim->name);
00327         MEM_freeN(anim->qtime);
00328         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("qt: can't load %s\n", anim->name);
00329         [QTMovie exitQTKitOnThread];
00330         [pool drain];
00331         return -1;
00332     }
00333     [anim->qtime->movie retain];
00334 
00335     // sets Media and Track!
00336     
00337     videoTracks = [anim->qtime->movie tracksOfMediaType:QTMediaTypeVideo];
00338     
00339     if([videoTracks count] == 0) {
00340         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("qt: no video tracks for movie %s\n", anim->name);
00341         [anim->qtime->movie release];
00342         MEM_freeN(anim->qtime);
00343         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("qt: can't load %s\n", anim->name);
00344         [QTMovie exitQTKitOnThread];
00345         [pool drain];
00346         return -1;
00347     }
00348     
00349     anim->qtime->media = [[videoTracks objectAtIndex:0] media];
00350     [anim->qtime->media retain];
00351     
00352     
00353     frameSize = [[anim->qtime->movie attributeForKey:QTMovieNaturalSizeAttribute] sizeValue];
00354     anim->x = frameSize.width;
00355     anim->y = frameSize.height;
00356 
00357     if(anim->x == 0 && anim->y == 0) {
00358         if(QTIME_DEBUG) printf("qt: error, no dimensions\n");
00359         free_anim_quicktime(anim);
00360         [pool drain];
00361         return -1;
00362     }
00363 
00364     anim->qtime->ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (anim->x, anim->y, 32, IB_rect);
00365     
00366     qtTimeDuration = [[anim->qtime->media attributeForKey:QTMediaDurationAttribute] QTTimeValue];
00367     anim->qtime->durationTime = qtTimeDuration.timeValue;
00368     anim->qtime->durationScale = qtTimeDuration.timeScale;
00369     
00370     anim->qtime->framecount = [[anim->qtime->media attributeForKey:QTMediaSampleCountAttribute] longValue];
00371     anim->qtime->previousPosition = -2; //Force seeking for first read
00372     
00373     //fill blender's anim struct
00374 
00375     anim->duration = anim->qtime->framecount;
00376     anim->params = 0;
00377 
00378     anim->interlacing = 0;
00379     anim->orientation = 0;
00380     anim->framesize = anim->x * anim->y * 4;
00381 
00382     anim->curposition = 0;
00383 
00384     [pool drain];
00385                                                  
00386     return 0;
00387 }

00389 int imb_is_a_quicktime (char *name)
00390 {
00391     NSImage *image;
00392     int result;
00393     NSAutoreleasePool *pool;
00394     
00395     if(!G.have_quicktime) return 0;
00396 
00397     pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00398     
00399     // don't let quicktime image import handle these
00400     if( BLI_testextensie(name, ".swf") ||
00401         BLI_testextensie(name, ".txt") ||
00402         BLI_testextensie(name, ".mpg") ||
00403         BLI_testextensie(name, ".wav") ||
00404         BLI_testextensie(name, ".mov") ||   // not as image, doesn't work
00405         BLI_testextensie(name, ".avi") ||
00406         BLI_testextensie(name, ".mp3")) return 0;
00407 
00408     
00409     image = [[NSImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:name]];
00410     if (image) {
00411         [image release];
00412         result = true;
00413     }
00414     else 
00415         result = false;
00416 
00417     [pool drain];
00418     return result;
00419 }

00421 ImBuf  *imb_quicktime_decode(unsigned char *mem, int size, int flags)
00422 {
00423     struct ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
00424     NSSize bitmapSize;
00425     uchar *rasterRGB = NULL;
00426     uchar *rasterRGBA = NULL;
00427     uchar *toIBuf = NULL;
00428     int x, y, to_i, from_i;
00429     NSData *data;
00430     NSBitmapImageRep *bitmapImage;
00431     NSBitmapImageRep *blBitmapFormatImageRGB,*blBitmapFormatImageRGBA;
00432     NSAutoreleasePool *pool;
00433 
00434     if(!G.have_quicktime)
00435         return NULL;
00436     
00437     pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00438     
00439     data = [NSData dataWithBytes:mem length:size];
00440     bitmapImage = [[NSBitmapImageRep alloc] initWithData:data];
00441     
00442     if (!bitmapImage) {
00443         fprintf(stderr, "imb_cocoaLoadImage: error loading image\n");
00444         [pool drain];
00445         return NULL;
00446     }
00447     
00448     bitmapSize.width = [bitmapImage pixelsWide];
00449     bitmapSize.height = [bitmapImage pixelsHigh];
00450     
00451     /* Tell cocoa image resolution is same as current system one */
00452     [bitmapImage setSize:bitmapSize];
00453     
00454     /* allocate the image buffer */
00455     ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(bitmapSize.width, bitmapSize.height, 32/*RGBA*/, 0);
00456     if (!ibuf) {
00457         fprintf(stderr, 
00458                 "imb_cocoaLoadImage: could not allocate memory for the " \
00459                 "image.\n");
00460         [bitmapImage release];
00461         [pool drain];
00462         return NULL;
00463     }
00464     
00465     /* read in the image data */
00466     if (!(flags & IB_test)) {
00467         
00468         /* allocate memory for the ibuf->rect */
00469         imb_addrectImBuf(ibuf);
00470         
00471         /* Convert the image in a RGBA 32bit format */
00472         /* As Core Graphics does not support contextes with non premutliplied alpha,
00473          we need to get alpha key values in a separate batch */
00474         
00475         /* First get RGB values w/o Alpha to avoid pre-multiplication, 32bit but last byte is unused */
00476         blBitmapFormatImageRGB = /*RGB format padded to 32bits*/[[NSBitmapImageRep alloc] initWithBitmapDataPlanes:NULL
00477                                                                          pixelsWide:bitmapSize.width 
00478                                                                          pixelsHigh:bitmapSize.height
00479                                                                       bitsPerSample:8 samplesPerPixel:3 hasAlpha:NO isPlanar:NO
00480                                                                      colorSpaceName:NSCalibratedRGBColorSpace 
00481                                                                        bitmapFormat:0
00482                                                                         bytesPerRow:4*bitmapSize.width
00483                                                                        bitsPerPixel:32];
00484         
00485         [NSGraphicsContext saveGraphicsState];
00486         [NSGraphicsContext setCurrentContext:[NSGraphicsContext graphicsContextWithBitmapImageRep:blBitmapFormatImageRGB]];
00487         [bitmapImage draw];
00488         [NSGraphicsContext restoreGraphicsState];
00489         
00490         rasterRGB = (uchar*)[blBitmapFormatImageRGB bitmapData];
00491         if (rasterRGB == NULL) {
00492             [bitmapImage release];
00493             [blBitmapFormatImageRGB release];
00494             [pool drain];
00495             return NULL;
00496         }
00497         
00498         /* Then get Alpha values by getting the RGBA image (that is premultiplied btw) */
00499         blBitmapFormatImageRGBA = /* RGBA */[[NSBitmapImageRep alloc] initWithBitmapDataPlanes:NULL
00500                                                                           pixelsWide:bitmapSize.width
00501                                                                           pixelsHigh:bitmapSize.height
00502                                                                        bitsPerSample:8 samplesPerPixel:4 hasAlpha:YES isPlanar:NO
00503                                                                       colorSpaceName:NSCalibratedRGBColorSpace
00504                                                                         bitmapFormat:0
00505                                                                          bytesPerRow:4*bitmapSize.width
00506                                                                         bitsPerPixel:32];
00507         
00508         [NSGraphicsContext saveGraphicsState];
00509         [NSGraphicsContext setCurrentContext:[NSGraphicsContext graphicsContextWithBitmapImageRep:blBitmapFormatImageRGBA]];
00510         [bitmapImage draw];
00511         [NSGraphicsContext restoreGraphicsState];
00512         
00513         rasterRGBA = (uchar*)[blBitmapFormatImageRGBA bitmapData];
00514         if (rasterRGBA == NULL) {
00515             [bitmapImage release];
00516             [blBitmapFormatImageRGB release];
00517             [blBitmapFormatImageRGBA release];
00518             [pool drain];
00519             return NULL;
00520         }
00521         
00522         /*Copy the image to ibuf, flipping it vertically*/
00523         toIBuf = (uchar*)ibuf->rect;
00524         for (x = 0; x < bitmapSize.width; x++) {
00525             for (y = 0; y < bitmapSize.height; y++) {
00526                 to_i = (bitmapSize.height-y-1)*bitmapSize.width + x;
00527                 from_i = y*bitmapSize.width + x;
00528                 
00529                 toIBuf[4*to_i] = rasterRGB[4*from_i]; /* R */
00530                 toIBuf[4*to_i+1] = rasterRGB[4*from_i+1]; /* G */
00531                 toIBuf[4*to_i+2] = rasterRGB[4*from_i+2]; /* B */
00532                 toIBuf[4*to_i+3] = rasterRGBA[4*from_i+3]; /* A */
00533             }
00534         }
00535         
00536         [blBitmapFormatImageRGB release];
00537         [blBitmapFormatImageRGBA release];
00538     }
00539     
00540     /* release the cocoa objects */
00541     [bitmapImage release];
00542     [pool drain];
00543     
00544     if (ENDIAN_ORDER == B_ENDIAN) IMB_convert_rgba_to_abgr(ibuf);
00545     
00546     /* return successfully */
00547     return (ibuf);  
00548 }
